body_html: Great! Been running into a similar problem myself. As a question, is there a local version of the patch I could use? I'm running Tensorflow 0.8.0 on a cluster, and the sysadmins won't rebuild the cluster version before TF 0.9.0 (or the next stable version)

body: Great! Been running into a similar problem myself. As a question, is there a local version of the patch I could use? I'm running Tensorflow 0.8.0 on a cluster, and the sysadmins won't rebuild the cluster version before TF 0.9.0 (or the next stable version)
